author: justindrake
content: Ethproofs call #2 (Fri, May 23 at 2pm UTC) will be dedicated to real-time proving. Please DM me or <@836720546842148864> for a calendar invite ðŸ™‚ By real-time proving I mean snarking mainnet EVM blocks in 1 slot (i.e. under 12sec latency).

author: pcaversaccio
content: a quick question: I was going through the execution specs (re the new precompiles) and couldn't find `prague` on the `main` branch (only on a different devnet branch; https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/tree/devnets/prague/6/src/ethereum/prague/vm). Is there a particular reason why `prague` is not present on `main`?

author: gurukamath
content: We are working on a quick clean-up (code comments, notes, minor re-factors etc) of the Pectra code before we add it to main. It should be in main pretty soon.
